q_en: List the progress percentage of all sewing groups
gt:
Sure thing! Let's take a look at the progress percentage of all the sewing groups. I've organized the information into a neat table for you. üòä

| Sewing Group      | Total Completed | Total Planned | Progress Percentage |
|-------------------|-----------------|---------------|---------------------|
| Master Sewers     | 1525            | 1565          | 97.45%              |
| Skilled Sewers    | 1050            | 1080          | 97.22%              |
| Advanced Sewers   | 795             | 970           | 82.00%              |
| Premier Sewers    | 560             | 750           | 74.67%              |
| Elite Sewers      | 260             | 590           | 44.07%              |

To calculate the progress percentage, we use the formula:

\[ \text{Progress Percentage} = \left( \frac{\text{Total Completed}}{\text{Total Planned}} \right) \times 100 \]

I hope this helps! If you have any more questions, feel free to ask. üòÑ

steps.sql: SELECT id, name FROM working_group WHERE type = 'sew';
steps.description: Retrieve all sewing group IDs and their names

steps.sql: SELECT working_group_id, SUM(completed_number) AS total_completed FROM sewing_tasks GROUP BY working_group_id;
steps.description: For each sewing group, calculate the total completed number of sewing tasks

steps.sql: SELECT working_group_id, SUM(planned_number) AS total_planned FROM sewing_tasks GROUP BY working_group_id;
steps.description: For each sewing group, calculate the total planned number of sewing tasks
